title: Liberty the Circus Cat
description: Liberty the fun-loving circus cat performs at Mr. Shepherd's colourful circus. Tiger Princess, the star of the show, becomes jealous of her, but when robbers break in they are in big trouble. Mr. Shepherd is knocked over, Tiger Princess gets trapped in a net, the future of the circus is in danger. What will they do? Tiger and Liberty come up with a great plan of action.
author: Desiree Milonas-King
